body_html: This is still an issue in TF 1.12 as well. I am not sure if there is any reason for the entire network to be 2x slower with virtual batches. This is the case even when using virtual batchsize = batchsize.
body_text: This is still an issue in TF 1.12 as well. I am not sure if there is any reason for the entire network to be 2x slower with virtual batches. This is the case even when using virtual batchsize = batchsize.
body: This is still an issue in TF 1.12 as well. I am not sure if there is any reason for the entire network to be 2x slower with virtual batches. This is the case even when using `virtual batchsize = batchsize`.
